commendations.name: Resilient
commendations.text: During the Post-Battle Sequence, if this unit would roll 2 or more black attack dice when making a Casualty Check, it may reroll 1 of those dice.

commendations.name: Veteran Leader
commendations.text: This unit gains INSPIRE 2

commendations.name: Special Munitions
commendations.text: Once per Game, when this unit makes an attack during its Activation, choose 1 of its Attack Pools before rolling dice. The chosen Attack Pool gains Anti-Materiel 2 and Impact 1.

commendations.name: Well-Stocked
commendations.text: This unit may use the effect of its Special Munitions Commendation once per Round, instead of once per Game.

commendations.name: One in a Million
commendations.text: Once per Game, when this unit makes an attack during its Activation, choose 1 of its Attack Pools before rolling dice. Upgrade 2 dice in the chosen Attack Pool.

commendations.name: Sterner Stuff
commendations.text: Once per game, when this unit would remove its last miniature from the battlefield after suffering Wounds from an attack, roll 1 black attack die. On a CRIT or HIT result, do not remove that miniature. It survives with 1 Wound remaining.

commendations.name: Strongpoint Expertise
commendations.text: This unit gains Prepared Position. While this unit is completely within allied Territory, it rolls red defense dice instead of white defense dice when rolling its Cover Pool.

commendations.name: Marksmanship Badge
commendations.text: This unit gains Precise 1

commendations.name: Harsh Environments Gear
commendations.text: This unit gains Unhindered

commendations.name: Advanced Drill
commendations.text: This unit gains a TRAINING upgrade slot.

commendations.name: Forward Patrol
commendations.text: This unit gains a COMMS upgrade slot.

commendations.name: Extra Equipment
commendations.text: This unit gains a GEAR and GRENADE upgrade slot

commendations.name: Field Modifications
commendations.text: This unit increases its Wound Threshold by 1 and its Resiliency by 1, if it has Resiliency

commendations.name: Flexible Response
commendations.text: This unit gains a HEAVY WEAPON upgrade slot and Flexible Response X, where X is the number of upgrade slots this unit has.

commendations.name: Recon Badge
commendations.text: This unit gains Scout 1

commendations.name: Assault Badge
commendations.text: This unit gains Tactical 1

commendations.name: Personal Shields
commendations.text: This unit gains Recharge 1 and Shielded 1

commendations.name: Feats of Valor
commendations.text: This unit increases its Courage by 1

commendations.name: Self-Sufficient
commendations.text: This unit gains Independent: Aim 1 or Dodge 1. If this unit already had the Independent keyword, it may increase the X value of that keyword by 1 instead.

commendations.name: Fearsome
commendations.text: This unit gains Demoralize 1

commendations.name: Urban Assault Experts
commendations.text: When this unit attacks an enemy unit that has Cover due to being Obscured by terrain, this unit has Sharpshooter 1 until the end of that attack.

commendations.name: Expert Pilot
commendations.text: This unit gains Nimble and Outmaneuver.
